comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: Amazing caption; certainly a distinctive take on Uptown.  Was it ever really a neighborhood of poor white Southerners?  In the 70s?  Would love to know.

comment.author: 40829684@N03
comment._content: yes most definitely. born in the building behind the fire house in 1967. left Uptown when I was 16. was one of those poor white southern kids running a muck thru the streets barefoot. bittersweet moments for me. It stayed that way until the "White Flight" took place. Other ethnics moved into the neighborhood in the late 70s which cause chaos in the Uptown area.

comment.author: 74471476@N08
comment._content: Thanks for writing back.  May I ask what part of the South your folks were from?  Had they lived in Uptown long?  I wonder what government project this picture was part of. . . .
